original_text: This shows us that God judges people in a way that is right. Now you are receiving much trouble because you belong to God's kingdom. This shows that God accepts you as the people that he rules.
korean_text: 이는 하나님의 공의로운 심판의 표요 너희로 하여금 하나님의 나라에 합당한 자로 여김을 받게 하려 함이니 그 나라를 위하여 너희가 또한 고난을 받느니라

sentences.original_text: in a way that is right
Now you are receiving much trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 많은 환란을 겪고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: because you belong to God's kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 하나님의 나라에 속해 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: as the people that he rules
